jcr:content.jcr:title: Best Father's Day Gifts
jcr:content.pageProperty_description: The best Father's Day gift ideas from Backcountry to get your father playing outside with the best gear from his favorite brands.

text.text:
Best Father's Day Gifts

Top Picks For Dad

text_1047561452_copy.text:
We love lifting the rad dads in our lives with some proper appreciation, so we pulled together our top picks to stoke the Father’s Day spirit. Find gifts for dads who bike, fish, run, and every other way fathers have fun.

 

Follow along to see the gear we’re fired up about!

text_1047561452_copy_530945013.text: Gifts For Biker Dads

text_1047561452_copy_1789137914.text: Our Backcountry Slickrock 9in Bike Short is perfect for sneaking out on lunch rides thanks to its modern fit and stretchy feel. We made these shorts to be lightweight and efficient—they are by far the most popular shorts for the dads in our Herd.

text_1047561452_copy_1926446160.text:
The Fox Speedframe MIPS Pro Helmet is an obvious choice for the dad who needs an update in the helmet department. With trustworthy MIPS protection, an adjustment dial, and a washable liner, it’s definitely dad-approved.

 

Shop All Bike

text_1047561452_copy_111775785.text: Gifts For Fisher Dads

text_1047561452_copy_1873113806.text: For the father who enjoys his time on the water, treat him to something special this year with the Sage Arbor XL Fly Reel. This high-quality reel from Sage boasts ultra-fast line retrieval to ensure dad reels in the next monster without a hitch.

text_1047561452_copy_1463870869.text:
Developed for dedicated watermen, the Grundens Deck Boss Ankle Boot is ready for hard-earned days on and off the boat. These boots are perfect for the angler dad who appreciates durable gear that’s truly top-notch.  

 

Shop All Fly Fishing

text_1047561452_copy_705018779.text: Gifts For Camper Dads

text_1047561452_copy_954426643.text: The functional, yet classic style of the Birkenstock Arizona Leather Sandal is a game-changer for every dad who appreciates comfort at the campsite. The slide-on design is convenient with or without socks, and the cork midsole contours to the foot’s shape for comfort that will last all weekend.

text_1047561452_copy_1718363095.text:
The RovR RollR 80 Cooler is just about as cool as campsite gadgets get. It’s got a sweet retro-inspired design, burly off-road tires, and it’s even grizzly bear resistant for peace of mind—not to mention it can hold ice for up to 10 days.

 

Shop All Camp

text_1047561452_copy_1899085562.text: Gifts For Climber Dads

text_1047561452_copy_760830395.text: We engineered the Backcountry Climb Jogger for epic trips to Joshua Tree, and so we can easily go straight from work to the crag. These stretchy pants nail all of the comfort requirements for your trad dad, with breathable materials to boot.

teaser_55713996.alt: La Sportiva TX4 R Approach Shoe
teaser_55713996.jcr:description: La Sportiva TX4 R Approach Shoe

text_1047561452_copy_91137533.text:
Any dad who knows the legendary reputation of La Sportiva’s climbing shoes will be sure to appreciate the TX4 R Approach Shoes. The retro-inspired banding pays homage to the forefathers of climbing, and the ultra-sticky Vibram Megagrip sole is produced through a patented resole platform to reduce waste.  

 

Shop All Climb

text_1047561452_copy_799608600.text: Gifts For Runner Dads

text_1047561452_copy_1452297728.text: For the dad’s that can’t resist logging miles whenever possible, grab a pair of the On Cloudmonster Shoes for maximum cushioning. CloudTec channels and Helion foam provide a forgiving, pillowy ride for everything from long routes to recovery jogs.

text_1047561452_copy_1055680218.text:
The trail runner dad in your life will be forever grateful for a Salomon Sense Pro 5L Hydration Vest this Father’s Day. SensiFit technology helps this vest maintain a secure fit, while included soft flasks make hydration easy and slosh-free.  

 

Shop All Run
